# saladcloud Provider

SaladCloud Public API: The SaladCloud Public API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    saladcloud = {
      source  = "squat/saladcloud"
      version = "0.1.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "saladcloud" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

### Optional

- `api_key_auth` (String, Sensitive)
- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://api.salad.com/api/public)
